SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements emphasize the need for secure and encrypted communication channels to ensure privacy and confidentiality in healthcare-related interactions.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement P-006-FR-003 specifically targets caregivers interacting with clients' family members and healthcare providers, while P-004-FR-002 focuses on Mike (a specific user) coordinating with patients and healthcare providers.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Secure Communication Channels
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system must provide secure and encrypted communication channels for all users (caregivers, healthcare providers, and patients) to ensure privacy and confidentiality in healthcare-related interactions.
